name: get_anime_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool animes.
Tool description: Get all data from your favorite anime, and the chapter or tomo of the manga or  the light novel that the anime adapted
API description: This endpoint will allow a user to get the data of a specific anime. It will take the anime's mal_id as a parameter and return the anime's data in JSON format. The data returned will include the anime's title, aired episodes, genre, and a brief synopsis.

is_id.description: The MyAnimeList ID of the anime.

fields.description: Comma-separated list of specific fields to retrieve data for. Available fields include '*', 'id', 'title', 'main_picture', 'start_date', 'end_data', 'synopsis', 'mean', 'rank', 'popularity', 'num_list_users', 'num_scoring_users', 'status', 'genres', 'num_episodes', 'source', 'studios', 'volume', 'chapter', 'light_novel', 'media_type', 'mal_id', 'broadcast', 'statistics', 'related_manga', 'related_anime', 'season', 'year', 'title_english', 'title_japanese', and 'synonyms'. Defaults to None.
